profile_positions.description:
Founded in the UK in October 2008, ersg is a leading engineering consultancy company operating worldwide in the energy sector. We have offices in the USA, Germany, The Netherlands, Ireland, Taiwan and Japan.
At ERSG we pride ourselves in providing staff to the Renewable Energy Industry. Our areas of expertise are Offshore and Onshore Wind, Solar, Oil and Gas. Placements are made both on a contract level and permanent basis, for a full range of positions in all phases of the project life cycle.
profile_positions.title: Principal Delivery Consultant

profile_positions.description:
The Advanced Banking Practice teach us to recognises that consumer protection is an essential element of a diverse, dynamic and challenging banking environment. The relationships between personal and small business customers and their banks. The Code of Banking Practice sets out the minimum standards customers can expect from their bank in relation to services and products. 
This practice is based on the key principles of fairness, transparency, accountability and reliability. To continuously improve the standards of practice, service and effective access to appropriate financial services. To promote better-informed decisions about banking products and services, by, providing effective and adequate information disclosure, explaining the contents of brochures and other written information about banking products or services when asked, providing information or advice about banking products or services through authorised staff at your request. This can include provision of transactions and/or assistance to calculate your transaction behaviour and costs, information to compare different bank transaction products, alternatively your bank will refer you to appropriate external sources or recommend you retain the services of a legal or financial adviser.
